name: In the footage
description:
"In the footage" is an exploration-based horror adventure.





Awakening in an empty room, you begin by playing a videotape left on the floor, pondering the meaning of the footage displayed. At this point, you have nothing else to do. It's only natural.

Who are you?
Why are you here?
What is this place?
What should you do?
Is it acceptable to do that?
Or is it no longer a matter of good or evil?

The dolls have noticed you.
They will come to understand what is happening and attempt to stop it.
You don't have much time.

Look at the clock.
You must get out of that small room.


  • An exploration-based horror adventure.
  • You awaken in a small room and need to understand the situation and find a solution.
  • By playing the videotape, you can explore and observe the scenes within the footage.
